execution_plan.description: Retrieve each order that has at least one product by returning one row per order-item: order_id, order_status_code and the product_id. The application will aggregate these rows to count products per order.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status_code, oi.product_id FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;
